name: Covey.Town GameArea
description: Enhanced Covey.Town by introducing a new feature that enables players to engage in games against one another. Players can enter the game queue and create groups within the queue

name: ASL Sign Detection
description: Trained logistic regression model and three different CNN architectures to predict ASL signs from images. Achieved 99% accuracy by fine-tuning pre-trained Xception and VGG19 models

name: Marvel Character Catalog
description: Designed React and TypeScript frontend for Marvel API with functionality for searching and filtering characters by comic, event, or series

name: Lucy's Love Bus
description: Collaborated within a team of seven to develop Java Vert.x, React, TypeScript, Postgres event registration web application for local nonprofit organization

name: Self Driving with DQN
description: Built Deep Q-learning Network autonomous driving system using Keras and OpenAI Gym. Tested feasibility with lane change, park, and intersection environments

name: Falcon 9 Booster Tracker
description: Developed responsive web application with PostgreSQL, Express, React, and Node to manage boosters and missions of SpaceXâ€™s Falcon 9 rocket
